title: Problems with http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com
body: Hey, for a week, I have problems with comments in nexus. They just don't load at any place.Help me.I wanna see the dank memes hidden there.Here's a screenshot http://prntscr.com/fsvm5e . The loading wheel spins endlessly.It actually works in Mozilla but I hate it so I need it to work in Chrome.

replies.body: So hey, is there any chance I'll get some help? I'll make another thread for another chance of help if not.
Doesn't work on my tablet either. I guess there's something up with my account.
Just noticed that they actually load while I'm not logged into my account. ??????

I'd try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) for Chrome to see if you can get those comments to load correctly. Let me know if that helps or not!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cHKAarlu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-08T03:24:07.282+0000)
>
> I'd try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) for Chrome to see if you can get those comments to load correctly. Let me know if that helps or not!

Didn't help :/ Cleared them with CCleaner
